BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot token after creating a bot with @BotFather

PM_LOG.description: Your pm logging group's id, whenever someone pm's you the bot will send it here

TAG_LOG.description: Your tags logging group's id, whenever someone tah you or reply to your messages, it will be sent here

ALIVE_PIC.description: Your alive pic, leaving it empty will result in a rimuru pic
